description: This file defines a set of API service functions for managing sales data, aligned with FastAPI OpenAPI spec. It includes functions to list, create, retrieve, update, and delete sales, utilizing imported HTTP utility functions.

methods.name: listSales({ skip = 0, limit = 10, status, customer_name } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a list of sales with optional filtering parameters.

methods.name: createSale(payload)
methods.description: Creates a new sale record with the provided payload.

methods.name: getSale(saleId)
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific sale identified by saleId.

methods.name: updateSale(saleId, payload)
methods.description: Updates an existing sale identified by saleId with the provided payload.

methods.name: deleteSale(saleId)
methods.description: Deletes a sale identified by saleId.

ctags.name: listSales
ctags.pattern: /^export async function listSales({ skip = 0, limit = 10, status, customer_name } = {}) {$/
